modules.name: godot-tools
build-commands:
scons platform=x11 \
                       CCFLAGS=-I/app/include \
                       prefix=/app \
                       unix_global_settings_path=/app \
                       verbose=yes \
                       progress=no \
                       -j `nproc` \
                       target=release_debug \
                       use_llvm=yes \
                       builtin_freetype=no \
                       builtin_libmpcdec=yes \
                       builtin_libogg=no \
                       builtin_libpng=no \
                       builtin_libtheora=no \
                       builtin_libvorbis=no \
                       builtin_libwebp=no \
                       builtin_openssl=no \
                       builtin_libvpx=no \
                       builtin_zlib=no \
                       builtin_opus=yes \
                       builtin_speex=yes \
                       builtin_squish=yes \
                       pulseaudio=yes \
                       udev=no \
                       tools=yes

modules.name: godot-release-template
build-commands:
scons platform=x11 \
                       CCFLAGS=-I/app/include \
                       prefix=/app \
                       unix_global_settings_path=/app \
                       verbose=yes \
                       progress=no \
                       -j `nproc` \
                       target=release \
                       use_llvm=yes \
                       builtin_freetype=no \
                       builtin_libmpcdec=yes \
                       builtin_libogg=no \
                       builtin_libpng=no \
                       builtin_libtheora=no \
                       builtin_libvorbis=no \
                       builtin_libwebp=no \
                       builtin_openssl=no \
                       builtin_libvpx=no \
                       builtin_zlib=no \
                       builtin_opus=yes \
                       builtin_speex=yes \
                       builtin_squish=yes \
                       pulseaudio=yes \
                       udev=no \
                       tools=no

modules.name: integration
build-commands:
for size in {32,64,128,256}; do \
                    rsvg-convert org.godotengine.Godot.svg -w "$size" -h "$size" -a -f png -o "$size.png"; \
                    install -Dm644 "$size.png" "/app/share/icons/hicolor/${size}x${size}/apps/org.godotengine.Godot.png"; \
                done
